# Command: GetAllCameras(C#)

## Description:

Return all cameras that are in the scene. This method is only implemented in C#


## Parameters:

|      Name       |     Type      | Optional | Description |
| --------------- | ------------- | -------- | ----------- |
|None|

## Return
- List of AltUnityObjects
## Examples

```eval_rst
.. tabs::

    .. code-tab:: c#

       //TODO
    
```
